page.title: 12PORTHMADOG RELIGION
page.content: The area includes the following religious establishments:{PORTHMADOG : St.John's Church,Capel Coffadwriaethol Ambrose(Cong.),Salem(Cong.),Ebenezer (Methodist),Garth(Presb.),Tabernacl (Presb.),Christ the Redeemer(R.C.), Friendship House(Evang.).{BORTH-Y-GEST St.Cyngar's Church,Ebenezer(Presb.), Bethel(Cong.).{MINFFORDD}:Minffordd Chapel(Presb.) Religion in Porthmadog has taken a drastic downward slide.Whereas all chapels and churches were full to capacity at the turn of the century, now one chapel would suffice the community.Two chapels have been demolished (1 in 1985) with their vestries converted to places of worship.However the Roman Catholic Church is very well attended especially during the summer months.
